body.name: PNY 64GB Duo Link USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive for Android Devices and Computers - External Mobile Storage for Photos, Videos, and More - 200MB/s,Silver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 30 mins
features: The PNY DUO LINK USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive is the ideal mobile storage solution for file management on-the-go
Free up space on Type-C equipped Android mobile devices by transferring photos, videos, music and more to DUO LINK, making room for more memories
Transfer digital content from mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets to full size devices such as laptop and desktop computers for more permanent storage
Access and stream digital content anytime, anywhere, directly from DUO LINK, no Wi-Fi connection needed
Exceptional performance with read speeds of up to 200MB/s and transfers up to 10x faster than USB 2.0, coupled with a sleek, metal design
Dual connectors; a USB 3.2 Type-C connector for Type-C Android mobile devices and newer gen PC & Mac laptop and desktop computers, and a USB 3.2 Type-A connector for previous gen computers
body.description: The PNY DUO LINK USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive bridges the gap between mobile and desktop, making it the ideal mobile storage solution for file management on-the-go. DUO LINK is the perfect tool to free up space on Type-C equipped mobile devices by allowing users to move content such as photos, videos, music, and more from their smartphones and tablets to the drive, making room for more, and ensuring they will never miss an opportunity to capture content due to lack of memory. What’s more, the DUO LINK Dual Flash Drive allows for the transfer of content to full size devices such as laptop and desktop computers for permanent storage. With read speeds of up to 200MB/s and transfers up to 30x faster than USB 2.0, moving content from the drive to a computer is quick and easy. From there, users can take their content to the next level and create videos, social posts, process prints, or simply save their files on a more permanent storage device. The DUO Link USB 3.2 Type-C Dual Flash Drive is ideal for use across operating systems and host devices. With a USB 3.2 Type-C connector for Type-C Android mobile devices and newer gen PC & Mac laptop and desktop computers, and a USB 3.2 Type-A connector for previous gen computers, the potential for content creation and file management is near limitless.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 149 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetically appealing and does its job.
reviews.reviewText: Used in my MacBook for college stuff. No problems with it after a semester of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works on Mac, works on PC
reviews.reviewText: I got this to transfer files between my MacBook (USB C) and my PC (regular USB). Works great. Plug it in to the MacBook, drag files onto it, yank it out and flip the little connector around and load files onto PC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mine must have come from a good batch.
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with my 64GB variant of this drive. Larger ones seem to have had some manufacturing problems but none of those problems is present on mine. It’s very fast in the first few large copies I’ve done. I’m not one to measure my file copy time. I have dozens of drives and have developed a good sense of what is fast. Several 10GB copies through the C side were impressively quick and trouble free. The best part for me is the very well designed loop. Anything I’ve ever used to carry a stick with me fits perfectly with slack, no binding. All good here.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for the steam deck
reviews.reviewText: This is my go-to for moving files between a pc and a steam deck. Having access to both types of usb port on a single drive without the need for an adapter is super convinient. Could use some type of cover but otherwise i think its great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Female USB-A and very slow writes
reviews.reviewText: Slow write speed: ValiDrive is a new flash drive testing utility for Windows from Steve Gibson. I ran it on this PNY drive and 3 others.The write speed in microseconds for the other three were: 1000, 3700 and 5200For this PNY drive it was 623,200Also, who needs a USB flash drive with a female USBA port? I would think most people would want a male USBA port. The USBC port is male.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This thing is very well built. It's sleek and not to mention it's C Port and regular USB which is very convenient no need for a card reader or laptop to transfer/share media. I seen this exact same one in Walgreens for 45 bucks so it's a no-brainer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Metal case, read speed good, write speed somewhat slow
reviews.reviewText: It is in an attractive metal casing, and can be used with USB C or USB A.The read speed is good, but writing can be choppy: on both my smartphone or Mac, it appears it can write 60MB and then stop for a second or two, and then write another 60MB... it appears a few times slower than the read speed. (Note: this was probably due to the copy buffer is about 60MB and it needs time to "finish" that buffer before it moves forward). I have included a DiskMark screenshot, running on a quite powerful Lenovo gaming notebook with Intel i7-11800H and Nvidia 3080.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well and nice and compact
reviews.reviewText: Speed seems good, having two different USB types is nice, and it is very compact.
Ein Usb Stick der super funktioniert und das geile ist man kann ihn drehen entweder usb c oder A je nach dem was man braucht. Windows erkennt ihn sofort und schnell ist er auch und klein und kompakt.
I like the design; it's very elegant, and the price for 64 GB is quite reasonable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super lento! Nem sequer é USB 3.0!
reviews.reviewText: Os materiais são bons e a qualidade de construção é sólida. Este é o único aspeto positivo deste produto. Oferece uma velocidade máxima de 20 MB/s. Não o compre!
Cette clef USB semble un peu fragile. Mais j'ai confiance en la qualité PNY. Il manque simplement un mousqueton pour en faire un porte clef. J'ai résolu le problème.
